description: Try our easy to follow Jam Donut Hot Cross Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Easter,Quick & easy dessert
name: Jam Donut Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 pkt traditional fruit hot cross buns

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Pipe a small amount of raspberry jam into the sides of the hot cross buns.
Place buns on tray and brush with melted butter, then sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Bake for 7 minutes until warmed through. Sprinkle with extra cinnamon sugar and serve warm.
